purpose: The email is a call for papers for the MLOps25 workshop, which will be held in conjunction with the 28th European Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ECAI 2025) in Bologna, Italy. The workshop aims to address operational challenges in machine learning through discussions and submissions on various topics related to Machine Learning Operations (MLOps). It invites researchers and practitioners to share insights and advancements in the field, with a focus on bridging the gap between data science experimentation and reliable ML operations. Important dates for paper submissions and guidelines for submission are provided, along with information about publication opportunities for accepted papers.

evidence_sentences: MLOps25 Workshop on Machine Learning Operations
Event co-located with the 28th European Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ECAI 2025), October 25-30, 2025, Bologna (Italy)
This workshop encourages discussions on bridging the gap between data science experimentation and the reliable operation of ML components in production.
We invite submissions that address the open challenges, latest breakthroughs, and practical use cases in the rapidly evolving field of MLOps.
Submissions are encouraged on, but not limited to, the following topics: MLOps frameworks, ML systems lifecycle management, ML pipelines orchestration, and more.
Accepted papers will be published in the CEUR Workshop Proceedings (CEUR-WS.org).
We invite two types of submissions: Research Papers and Experience Reports.
